SELECT s.login_name as loginName, s.create_time as createTime, s.is_status as isStatus, s.name, s.login_time as loginTime, s.phone, s.email, s.ip, s.id FROM sys_user s INNER JOIN user_org u ON u.user_id = s.id where u.org_id=#{orgId} and s.is_delete=0
and s.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
